Help

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


The main article for this category is Christian martyrs.

Christianity portalCatholicism portalBiography portal
This category is for individuals and groups of martyrs who died for their Roman Catholic faith.
Earlier martyrs are categorised as Category:Ante-Nicene Christian martyrs (1st to 4th century) or Category:Christian martyrs of the Middle Ages (5th to 15th centuries).

  Christian martyrs  Christian martyrs by nationality  Christian martyrs by period  Groups of Christian martyrs  Catholic martyrs  Christian martyrs by century Christian saints killed by Muslims Christians executed for refusing to convert to Islam  Christian martyrs executed by decapitation  Eastern Orthodox martyrs Latter Day Saint martyrs Lists of Christian martyrs Oriental Orthodox martyrs  Protestant martyrs  Virgin martyrs
